TASK: Craft an item of type: light_gray_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "red_wool", "quantity": 56, "index": 19}, {"type": "lectern", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "water_bucket", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 34, "index": 36}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 25, "index": 37}, {"type": "music_disc_cat", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 14, "index": 40}, {"type": "torch", "quantity": 23, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft light_gray_concrete_powder, I need to place 4 sand, 1 gravel and 1 light_gray_dye in the crafting table. I have 4 sand in slot 11, so I will move 1 of them to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
